name: AsFastAsUCan
description:
Move in any direction you want... just survive and get old coins to restore your memory about your past(Music in game isn't implemented - Is highly recommended to use your favorite music durning play this game.
(tip: Trap Mixes from YT is the best music for this kind of games)Controll
WSAD - Move
Space/Esc - Pause
Left Shift - Spread Energy

Enjoy & Have Fun
